text:
A link in a table inside another table is positioned to the left of the 
respective text.
creator: ra.mc@mail.telepac.pt

text:
Created attachment 5345
XSLFO that reproduces problem
creator: ra.mc@mail.telepac.pt
ra.mc@mail.telepac.pt
text:
The problem seems to be that the x-offset introduced by columns in the 
container table is correctly applied to the text in the contained table, but 
not to the links.

I've set the severity to Major because of the use of 'blind tables' to control 
pagination or center tables.
*** Bug 20223 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
